scripts.dev: export DB_NAME=mongo_project_db && npm run mongo && nodemon index.js
scripts.mongo: npm run mongo:restart && npm run mongo:check && npm run mongo:seed
scripts.mongo:restart: npm run mongo:stop; npm run mongo:start
scripts.mongo:check: until docker exec mongo-sandbox mongosh --quiet --eval "use $DB_NAME;"; do echo ...; sleep 1; done
